snippet.title: Reverse Defenders Trailer w/ Gameplay | PC (Steam)
snippet.description:
Reverse Defenders is a tower defense game in which you defend the village from oncoming enemies.

Place characters of various classes and make use of skill combinations and mode switching to defend your village.

Choose your class, placement, skills, and bonus. With every combination, you can surely create your own original strategy.

Try, fail, learn, think, and become stronger.

Enjoy this very addictive experience with all you’ve got!

#ReverseDefenders #TowerDefense #Ste

Subscribe for more game trailers and videos about games: http://bit.ly/mustachegamer
